data.title: Frontend Developer
data.description: Exploring the front-end development world. I have been developing a new e-commerce website for Central Retail (Thailand's largest retailer).

data.title: Machine Learning Engineer
data.description: My first journey in software development. I worked with data scientists to develop machine learning-based services. The projects covered various areas such as credit scoring, optical character recognition, and a virtual wallet.

data.title: Research Assistant
data.description: Conducted a survey project from building a sampling frame, collecting data from 200+ startup owners, and analyzing data using descriptive and inferential statistics.

data.title: Data Scientist Intern
data.description: Applied statistics and machine learning knowledge with real-world business problems. Our team identified characteristics of potentially default credit card customers and proposed solutions to prevent credit approval for credit card applicants that obtain such characteristics.

data.title: Intern
data.description: Analyzed business performance and financial reports of a company of interest and identified its target stock price. I gained a concrete understanding of a capital market and investment strategy.

data.title: Sales Professional
data.description: Identified consumer needs and set up sales booths in different locations in Bangkok. I achieved the sales target within five weeks out of 11 weeks of the program period.
